metadata.Title: CVE-2017-0409 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: A remote code execution vulnerability in libstagefright could enable anattacker using a specially crafted file to execute arbitrary code in thecontext of an unprivileged process. This issue is rated as High due to thepossibility of remote code execution in an application that uses thislibrary. Product: Android. Versions: 6.0, 6.0.1, 7.0, 7.1.1. Android ID:A-31999646.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
